description.value: You unlock the most powerful secrets hidden in the stars above. You choose one of the following 7th-rank spells to add to your spell repertoire: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Retrocognition] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.True Target]. At 18th level, add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Pinpoint] to your spell repertoire, and at 20th level, add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Foresight] to your spell repertoire. You gain master proficiency with spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells.
